pages.text: Omnidens is a large arthropod like animal that would have resembled a gilled lobopodian. It is only known from mouth parts but is speculated to have grown up to 1.5 meters in length and probably resembled Pambdelurion in life.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Eggs
